thread.title: Hot Dog Lovers Relish Emoji Victory
thread.title_full: Hot Dog Lovers Relish Emoji Victory - WSJ

author: Joe Barrett
title: Hot Dog Lovers Relish Emoji Victory
text:
A Chicago-area hot dog stand is relishing its victory after a nearly two-year social media campaign to secure a place for the all-American meat product in the lexicon of emojis.
A new version of software for Apple Inc.â€™s iPhone, iPad and other products released this week included a pictogram of a hot dog on a bun with mustard that users can...
